text: Tsey khto sluzhatʹ tronu ta vsʹomu tsʹomu navkolo tse glorify ta khvalyatʹ yikhnʹoho Lorda, ta viryatʹ v Yomu. Ta vony prosyatʹ forgiveness dlya tsykh khto vvazhayutʹ: "Nash Lord, Vashe myloserdya ta Vashe znannya okhoplyuyutʹ vsi rechi. Prostitʹ tsi khto kaytesya ta sliduyutʹ za Vashym shlyakhom, ta zapasnymy yim retribution Pekla
